urls.title: Meet the US Newcomers
urls.description: The Newcomers Program is a four-year new talent initiative, recognizing and supporting international professionals and students who have recently moved to Los Angeles or New York to further their development and career. BAFTA is proud to introduce the current participants of our Newcomers Program.

Rebeca Huntt, Director

Rebeca's Breakthrough project is the documentary memoir Beba,  in which Rebeca explores her own identity as a young NYC-born and bred Afro-Latina and stares down historical, societal, and generational trauma. https://t.co/9vr3DoyxPJ

Melissa Adeyemo, Producer

Melissa's Breakthrough project is the feature film Eyimofe, which tells the story of two women in Lagos, both seeking to move to Europe in hopes of a better life.

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/pddtW4dde9

Megan Fox, Founder and Game Programmer

@glassbottommeg's Breakthrough project is the video game SkateBIRD, a game about a little skateboarding bird that tries their best. https://t.co/hw31wl6WxG

Ellie Foumbi, Writer and Director

@EllieAnette's Breakthrough project is the feature film Our Father, The Devil, an ethical and psychological thriller about an African immigrant whose life is upended by the arrival of a charismatic priest. https://t.co/nn0YNaRPrS

annotations.normalized_text: The Angry Black Girl and Her Monster

data.text:
Daphne Wu, Cinematographer

Daphne's Breakthrough projects are the documentary Accepted, and the feature film The Angry Black Girl and Her Monster, which tells the story of a teenage anti-hero on a desperate quest to cure death.

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/x9zWTbrmOJ

Charlotte Hornsby, Cinematographer

Charlotte's Breakthrough project is the feature film Master, a thriller about two women who are driven out of an Ivy League university by social and supernatural forces. 

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/8eerpWQhXw

This program offers students the opportunity to connect with an individual mentor, drawn from our talent development programs. https://t.co/cSDMtR77Dh

The Appointment in South Central is a surrealist horror-comedy film about an aspiring rapper who encounters The Grim Reaper during a near-death experience. ☠️

The film was made by the BAFTA Filmmaking Collective made of students sourced from our Los Angeles outreach programs. https://t.co/NragtqT6PX

urls.title: Seven Columbia Filmmakers Selected for Illustrious BAFTA Programs | School of the Arts
urls.description: The British Academy of Film and Television (BAFTA) recently announced the cohorts of its various 2022 programs and several Columbia filmmakers have been selected to join the academy’s prestigious ranks. Five Columbia filmmakers have been announced as the newest members of the BAFTA Newcomers Program. They are: alumni Fernando González Ortiz ’22, Felix van Kann ’22, Cheryl Wang ’22, Christina Wood ’20, and directing student Camille Hamadé. This four-year new talent initiative recognizes and supports

urls.title: How BAFTA Breakthrough Is Helping Rising Stars in the U.S. Propel Their Careers to the Next Level
urls.description: The program, which has already provided early career boosts for the likes of Tom Holland, Letitia Wright and Florence Pugh, offers emerging talents invaluable mentoring and networking opportunities to help them plot their next step: “It’s privileged position, but I want to handle it with grace and purpose.”

tweets.text: Thanks @THR for interviewing me about @BAFTAUS Breakthrough! 💫 I’m so excited to continue learning, meeting people and building community. Let’s get itttt!! ♥️🥹✨ https://t.co/75r1OOgu8u

tweets.text:
Get ready to celebrate the best of Scottish film, games and television this year at the #BAFTAScotAwards 2022, this Sunday🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 

✨Red carpet coverage on socials from 15:30 
✨Livestream from 17:30
✨Highlights on BBC Scotland/iPlayer from 22:00

Here we go!
https://t.co/JZSjK5HFmm https://t.co/oUZa7WVXUI

Thanks for having me, @BAFTA • I’m delighted to join the BAFTA community as a full member. Such an honour! 

Let’s go.. 🤝📽️🎶🗳️ @BAFTAUS https://t.co/N4mgUt2sHO
We'll also be joined by our Outstanding Contribution to Film and Television award recipient, the man of the (devil's 😈) hour, Peter Capaldi 👑 https://t.co/WDPllNsZ69

This Sunday is the @BAFTAScotland awards - as the official network partner we will be there on the red carpet, capturing all the action and celebrating all the amazing talent in Scotland. Tune in here + Insta stories on Sunday to follow the action as it happens. #BAFTAScotAwards https://t.co/i5jJGea550
As a part of our 75th-anniversary celebrations, our next screening with @RooftopCinema will be Richard Curtis’s holiday classic Love Actually. ❄️🎁 https://t.co/PdCHzDyKKI

Jordan Peele presented me an award, Guillermo Del Toro pointed at me, I won an award?!?! Ahhh!!! I ain’t too cool for school to geek out in these moments mannn!! I’m so grateful!! Sheeeesh! Blesssingsssssssss!!! AHHHHAHHSHSJWHSHDHEHUEJJE https://t.co/lYh9SIt0cN

Love reality TV? ❤️📺❤️

Then our upcoming Masterclass is for you! Take a deep dive into what it takes to create compelling, authentic and responsible reality TV.

Featuring the creatives behind:
Glow Up ✨
Love Island 🌴
Snowflake Mountain 🏔️

Book Tickets Now 👇
So grateful for this opportunity. Thank @BAFTA and @BAFTAUS ! https://t.co/Gv3mL4KJEt

urls.title: Four talented DPs revealed as part of 2022 BAFTA Breakthrough cohort
urls.description: Now, 21 UK-based and 12 US-based stars of the future have been selected to benefit from the initiative in 2022, including four cinematographers to watch: Diana Olifirova (UK), Alex Pritz, Charlotte Hornsby, and Daphne Qin Wu (all US).

tweets.text:
This year's @BAFTA Breakthrough cohort has been revealed and four talented cinematographers have made the cut.  

Find out more about Daphne, Charlotte, Diana and Alex below: 
https://t.co/pCJEVpjfgy

#BAFTA #BAFTABreakthrough https://t.co/iU2xqNw0Xp
So excited! Thank you and Congratulations to all the #BAFTABreakthrough talented artists! https://t.co/R5CxBSKNT8

Ahhh! I’m honored to announce that I’m one of the 2022-2023 @BAFTAUS Breakthrough USA along with so many incredible artists in the industry. This means so much to me. I can’t wait to start our journey together! 😭🫶🏼💫 https://t.co/7bCS0OQSNb
Brandon Perea has been selected for BAFTA Breakthrough 2022. https://t.co/0eTKXQySgs

BAFTA Breakthrough baaaaaby!!!

@BAFTA @BAFTAUS https://t.co/WHL9G2B8Bi

urls.title: BAFTA Breakthrough
urls.description: BAFTA Breakthrough showcases and supports the next generation of creative talent in film, games and television in the UK, the US and India.

tweets.text:
Say hello to this year's extraordinary #BAFTABreakthrough talent! A huge congratulations to the 2022 cohort and massive thanks to @Netflix for their support. Get to know the Breakthroughs below 👇
https://t.co/AqRnDv5t6q https://t.co/qPzl9YGFU0
So I have some news, https://t.co/lwZEmuPeup https://t.co/koGLVfsXmj

annotations.normalized_text: Hollywood Famous People Dang They Had Nice Fits Too

tweets.text:
I really like how there's this whole class of people who are like legit Hollywood Famous People Dang They Had Nice Fits Too and

oh hello yes I'm just over here with my punk undercut and Goodwill outfit :3

(but I'm really proud of my Goodwill outfit!) https://t.co/S9xuUED4PE

Melissa Adeyemo, Producer

Melissa's Breakthrough project is the feature film Eyimofe, which tells the story of two women in Lagos, both seeking to move to Europe in hopes of a better life.

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/pddtW4dde9

Megan Fox, Founder and Game Programmer

@glassbottommeg's Breakthrough project is the video game SkateBIRD, a game about a little skateboarding bird that tries their best. https://t.co/hw31wl6WxG

annotations.normalized_text: The Angry Black Girl and Her Monster

tweets.text:
Daphne Wu, Cinematographer

Daphne's Breakthrough projects are the documentary Accepted, and the feature film The Angry Black Girl and Her Monster, which tells the story of a teenage anti-hero on a desperate quest to cure death.

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/x9zWTbrmOJ

Charlotte Hornsby, Cinematographer

Charlotte's Breakthrough project is the feature film Master, a thriller about two women who are driven out of an Ivy League university by social and supernatural forces. 

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou https://t.co/8eerpWQhXw

Rebeca Huntt, Director

Rebeca's Breakthrough project is the documentary memoir Beba,  in which Rebeca explores her own identity as a young NYC-born and bred Afro-Latina and stares down historical, societal, and generational trauma. https://t.co/9vr3DoyxPJ

Ellie Foumbi, Writer and Director

@EllieAnette's Breakthrough project is the feature film Our Father, The Devil, an ethical and psychological thriller about an African immigrant whose life is upended by the arrival of a charismatic priest. https://t.co/nn0YNaRPrS

annotations.normalized_text: The Sex Lives of Colleges Girls

tweets.text:
Alex Pritz, Director

Alex's Breakthrough project is the documentary film The Territory which looks at the tireless fight of the Indigenous Uru-eu-wau-wau people against the encroaching deforestation brought by farmers and illegal settlers in the Brazilian Amazon. https://t.co/Th9g2B5I9E

Introducing the 2022 cohort of Breakthrough USA 💫

As @BAFTA's flagship talent initiative, the program supports creatives in film, games, and TV at their critical ‘breakthrough’ moment.

📸 BAFTA/Jessica Chou

#BAFTABreakthrough is supported by @Netflix.

Meet the cohort ⬇️ https://t.co/AinaUOoeD7

Looking to further your career in the games industry?

Or a recent graduate looking to make your big break?
 
We gotchu... BAFTA's #GuruLive is back (and in person) this weekend🥳
 
With a range of in-depth talks, Q&A's and networking opportunities that you won't want to miss👇

We’re saddened to hear that Leslie Phillips, best known for his appearances in the Carry On films and BAFTA-nominated for his incredible performance opposite Peter O’Toole in Venus, has died. Our thoughts are with his family. https://t.co/4XOYieUyMX

📢CALLING ALL GAME CREATORS! 📢

There is still time to submit your games for the 2023 #BAFTAGames Awards! 🎮

The eligibility window is January 1st - December 9th 2022, teams (big and small) worldwide can submit 🌎

Entries close on November 17th 📅

urls.title: Children and Young People
urls.description: Celebrating creativity and excellence in children and young people's film, games and television.

tweets.text:
We're opening up BAFTA's London HQ for our first-ever Children & Young People’s Festival on 26 and 27 November 🎉 

The weekend will be packed with fun, interactive activities for 7 to 14s - the perfect event for all budding film, TV and games creatives👉 https://t.co/G3hl7sgxKv https://t.co/pM6RQoJ0bF

🎊BAFTA Young Game Designers is BACK! 🎊

Aged 10-18 with a phenomenal concept for a game? Ready to build that game and have the world play it? Then #BAFTAYGD is for you.

Entries for Game Concept and Game Maker are OPEN!

📅Deadline for entries is Monday 6 March 2023 at 5pm 📅

Today is the last day for students to apply to the Vance Byrd Mentorship Program ✏️🎓

The program identifies and rewards talented students from across Los Angeles with access to BAFTA’s new talent programming and opportunities for mentorship, internships, and scholarships. https://t.co/fhVoO2zpio

Director of Gwledd/The Feast, @LeeHavenJones, writer, @rogwilliams and actress Nia Roberts, spoke to us about the horror genre and why its official home should be here in Wales...👻🎃 https://t.co/5JbIK66YlO
It’s Halloween, everyone’s entitled to one good scare - what's yours? https://t.co/9kusD2RLdG

It's National Mentoring Day, and to celebrate we'd like to spotlight the students apart of The Vance Byrd Mentorship Program. 💫

This program offers students the opportunity to connect with an individual mentor, drawn from our talent development programs. https://t.co/cSDMtR77Dh

Congratulations to all the amazing nominees 👏👏

Explore the full list below and come back on November 27 to discover the winners.
